utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just walked in the bathroom and saw Kathy naked! It was like torture!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know if we ever go to war and you're captured, you're in for a big surprise.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It just keeps getting worse and worse! Y'know? I mean it's bad enough that I'm in love with my roommate's girlfriend -- which by the way, I think she knows. Because every time we're in the room together there's this weird like energy between us. And call me crazy, but I think she likes me too. And now I have seen her naked. I mean at least when I've seen her with clothes on, I could imagine her body was like covered in boles or something. But there are no boles, she's smooth! Smooth!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow! Could everyone totally see up his robe?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Casey
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great! All right, so I'll call you later.

utterance.speaker: Casey
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey-Hey-Hey! Who was that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That would be Casey. We're going out tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Goin' out, huh? Wow! Wow! So things didn't work out with Kathy, huh? Bummer.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, things are fine with Kathy. I'm having a late dinner with her tonight, right after my early dinner with Casey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah. And the craziest thing is that I just ate a whole pizza by myself!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait! You're going out with Kathy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Why are you getting so upset?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I'm upset -- for you. I mean, having sex with an endless line of beautiful women must be very unfulfilling for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What is the big deal? It's not like we're exclusive.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, Joey, Kathy is clearly not fulfilling your emotional needs. But Casey, I mean granted I only saw the back of her head, but I got this sense that she's-she's smart, and funny, and gets you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got all that from the back of her head?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right look, I think it's time for you to settle down. Y'know? Make a choice, pick a lane.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who's Elaine?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: "Little, tiny Tarzan, swinging on a nose hair. Swinging with the greatest of ease..." Darn it! Now, I don't know who to get to the next verse.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, you could just go uh, "greatest of ease... BAH-bah-bha-bhannn." Then go right into it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, ooh, I like that! Yeah. Wait! How do you know about 'bah-bah-bha-bhan?'

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well umm, y'know, I used to play.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that's right, the keyboards, huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, just a little in high school, but then I really got into it in college. I mean that's-that's when I really found my sound.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God! Orange juice just came out of my nose, but it was totally worth it. Oh my God, I completely forgot about your sound.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He used to lock himself in the basement for hours. No one was every allowed to hear, "The Sound."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wanna hear "The Sound."

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? No. I mean, nah, I haven't played in so long, and-and, well it's-it's really personal stuff, y'know?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Come on, play that funky music white boy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, you guys, I mean my keyboards are all the way up in -- No, yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right! Bring it on, you...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here we go. Y'know, I've-I've never played my stuff for anyone before, so it's important that-that you understand it's about communicating very private emotions. Y'know, umm, you should-you should think of umm, my work as wordless sound poems. That's what I'm...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God! Play!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Boy, that was-that was, umm... terrific.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really, bitchin'!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, it was so -- wow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?! I mean, really?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean, you should play in public!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Thanks, you guys. That's uh -- ohhh, I wanna, I wanna play you another piece! Umm! Uh-oh! I left my uh, helicopter sounds on another disk. I'll be right back! Okay? This is so nice, I'm -- I am so...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God bless my dad sound proofing the basement!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I can't believe I ever let him touch me with those fingers.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you guys talking about, I loved it! It was soo moving. Oh, plus it's just, it's so different from the stuff you usually hear.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean like, music?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I know what you're thinkin'! Yes, yes, your breasts are just as firm and juicy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come in!

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Hey! Oh God, is that Baywatch?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh yes, but uh, I just watch it for the articles.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: So is Joey around?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no, he's not back yet, but he'll be here any minute. So uh, come on in. Have a seat. Bow or stern?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: I uh, don't really have a preference. You?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I like it in the stern. ...of the boat. Hello.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, it's me. Listen Casey and I were on our way back and had a little car trouble.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We broke down on the Parkway, so I have to walk back and get some transmission fluid. And hey, listen could you please tell Kathy that I'll be there as soon as I can.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why can't you tell her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: 'Cause I only have one quarter, and I think my time is about to --

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey! Joey!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I thought your time ran out.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me too, but I guess I do have a couple of more --

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, that was Joey. He's running a little late, he says he's sorry.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So I guess it's just uh, you and me then.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I think it is!

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: So what did you do today?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I had an appointment to get my haircut...

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Oh, it looks great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...and then it got canceled.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Well, I could cut it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?! You do that?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Yeah, I do. Of course, I learned at my aunt's dog grooming shop, but hey, what do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dog grooming huh? Okay, just don't make my tail too poofy.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: You have really great hair.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, thanks. I grow it myself. Y'know who also has great hair is Joey!

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Yes! Yeah! Joey has great hair! Umm, I'm basically done here. Just let me get this off your neck.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What-what 'cha doin'?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Checking to see if it's even.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 'Kay.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Looks good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh the phone! The phone's making sounds! Hello!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey dude, it's me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey it's Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen uh, I'm really sorry, it looks like I'm gonna be stuck here for a while. I got the transmission fluid, but when I went to put it in the car, the transmission wasn't there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, it must've fallen out a few blocks back. I just figured we hit a dog.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen uh, could you put Kathy on, I wanna apologize.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah man. Joey.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Hey. Oh no it's fine, don't worry about it. Yeah-no, stop apologizing, it's okay. Yeah! I'll talk to you tomorrow. I should uh, probably go.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Yes! Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: I forgot my purse.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: No, I really did forget my purse.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no, this is bad! It's bad! This is bad!

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Horrible!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait the uh, the kiss or the situation?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: No-no-no, the kiss was good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: No, but that's bad!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh! Yes! Okay! Here's what we do, we-we forget it happened.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, we-we swallow our feelings. Even if it means we're unhappy forever. Sound good?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Can you really do that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have to; he's my best friend, and you're seeing him.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Chandler, I like Joey a lot, but with you...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-no-no-no! Don't! Don't! See-see, you're getting me confused, I'm starting to urn.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: I'm sorry. If you wanna pretend that nothing happened, I can try.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I-I think we have too.

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: Okay. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bye. Are you still out there?

utterance.speaker: Kathy
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Electrifying. Emphatic time-time-time...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know, there's a Starbucks about three blocks down.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's so inspired! Look at him! Look at him go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you guys-guys-guys...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, aren't you up next?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, I'm not playing tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't follow Ross! It'd be like those bicycle ridding chimps that followed The Beetles. No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, Ross sucks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, the place has emptied because of him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, he's not even appreciated in his own time. I would give anything to not be appreciated in my own time!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Umm, Phoebe, you suck too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, Phoebe you're... awful!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys. You suck too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww man! I can't believe I locked myself out again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hang on buddy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! What happened here? Did you do all this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I sure did.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I just thought it'd make me feel good to do something nice for my friend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you're amazing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no. This is amazing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A TV as if it appears from nowhere! That's the dream! Man, how did you afford this stuff?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, y'know I'm 29. I mean who needs a savings account.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you are the best friends anyone has ever had.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-no-no-no, you are! You do this, you give me the great advice, and hey listen, I was thinking about what you said yesterday about focusing on one woman, I'm gonna do that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean with Casey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no, I think I'm gonna see how things go with Kathy. She's pretty cool.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Or Casey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, Kathy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Could be Casey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. No, Kathy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Consider Casey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y'know what I think? I think somebody's got a little crush on Casey. How 'bout I fix you two up? What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That all the pieces of my life are falling right into place!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! You were really great! You were really, really great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, thanks, thanks. So Monica tells me that uh, you don't want to play anymore because me and y'know my talent. Is that true?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, kinda. Yeah. Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I can't -- I mean y'know I was trying to be really y'know okay and upbeat about it, I just -- I feel so dwarfed by your musical gift. I...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: See but, Pheebs that-that is the exact opposite intent of my music. Y'know my music is-is meant to inspire, and if it bothers you this much, then I... I won't play anymore.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no. No-no-no, don't do that! How could I live with myself if I knew I was depriving the world of your music.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Chandler! Saw the new furniture. Very nice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Joey has the best boyfriend ever!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I kissed Kathy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Does Joey know?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. Is there anyway, anyway you think he'll understand this?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You obviously haven't screwed over a lot of your friends. Which we all appreciate.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No the-the sad thing is, if you had told him how you felt before you kissed her, knowing Joey, he probably just would've just stepped aside.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, don't say that! Don't say that. That's not true. Is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I think maybe, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He loves you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then why didn't you tell me to do that?!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I said-I said something to Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! No, that's right. And I thought it was a really good idea.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I remember that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I remember you did.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: God!! What am I gonna do?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Chandler, you're gonna have to tell him.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?! Why do I have to tell him?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because you do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, would it be okay if I wrote a song about this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Samboucha Margarita?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that a real thing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, we only had samboucha, so it is now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Listen ah, Joe, I-I need to, I need to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's-it's about Kathy. Umm, uh, I like her. I like her a lot actually.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you're timing couldn't be better. She's not my girlfriend anymore.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, she broke up with me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh uh, when?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just now, after acting class. At first I thought she was doing some kind of scene, that's why I let people watch.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh man, I am so sorry. Are, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I've been better. But, I'm all right. So you like her huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but I-I uh, don't have too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no, no it's uh, it's okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. You know why? 'Cause you came to me first.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I thought that would be the best thing to do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But hey, listen just so you know, you might have you're work cut out for you. 'Cause when I talked to her, I kinda got the feeling that she's into some other guy. So...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See uh, that's-that's actually what I wanted to talk to you about. I-I think I know who the other guy is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's me. I'm the other guy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean when you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking, and one thing to another and...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And what?! Did you sleep with her?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No! No! I just kissed her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!! That's even worse!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How is that worse?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know! But it's the same!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I'm sorry! But there's nothing I can do, I think I'm in love with her!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who cares?! You went behind my back! I would never do that to you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're right, I have no excuses! I was totally over the line.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Over the line?! You-you're-you're so far past the line, that you-you can't even see the line! The line is a dot to you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes. Yes! Right! And I feel horrible. You have to believe me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is that why you bought all this stuff?! Well, y'know what I will not watch your TV, I will not listen to your stereo, and there's a cinnamon raisin loaf in the new bread maker that I'm not gonna eat! You know why?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Probably because...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because it's all tainted with your betrayal. From now on this apartment is empty for me! And I'm not happy about you either. Oh, and just so you know, I made that bread for you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, he's lost it. He's totally lost it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, his music could not get any worse. There are rats in the basement that are hanging themselves.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you, thanks. Yeah, I lost it. Y'know, I'm not gonna play anymore, would you, can you finish my set?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: After that? Yeah! No, I mean if I can help.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, like I could lose it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I played bad on purpose guys.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, so you were trying to play bad this whole time.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah -- no, just that last song.
